unavailable.title: Cost Monitoring Unavailable
unavailable.desc: Unable to load cost statistics. Please check your connection and try again.

critical.title: Cost Limit Warning:
critical.body: You're approaching or have exceeded your cost limits. New requests may be blocked to prevent unexpected charges.

warning.title: Cost Limit Alert:
warning.body: You're approaching your cost limits. Consider reviewing your usage or increasing limits if needed.

recent.title: Recent Usage
recent.desc: Last 10 Bedrock API calls with cost information.

confirm.reset: Are you sure you want to reset all usage data? This action cannot be undone.

prompt.startDate: Enter start date (YYYY-MM-DD) or leave blank for all data:
prompt.endDate: Enter end date (YYYY-MM-DD) or leave blank for all data:

errors.resetDesc: An error occurred while resetting usage data.
errors.exportDesc: An error occurred while exporting usage data.
